name: Chirpy the penguin
description:
ITS TIME TO RUN RUN RUN!

CHIRPY IS HERE!

< Move Left > Move Right /\ Jump (If you are FearlessBot, you fly up) \/ Progress through text (If you are FearlessBot, you fly down) Spacebar: If you are Radwell, you swing your sword L: stop lag (L again to bring the effects back) Click: Air Boost (Kitty only) < and > to choose your player in the menu Chirpy: Can swim Phoebe: Jumps higher Wolfie: Can walljump Piggy: Runs quicker Radwell: Has a sword FearlessBot: Can fly (But can't touch the ground lol) Rosie: Can Double Jump Bunny: Falls Slower Kitty: Can Air Boost (three times per level) Levels: Azure Paradise: lots of rolling hills. Molten Ruins: once beautiful fields, this place is in ruins. Neon Highway: a colourful land in an infinite night. Frostbite Forest: a vast land with leafless trees in all directions. Melody Night: an arena of music, full of bouncy notes and trumpets. Lunar Dimension: a mountainous landscape lit up by a purple sun. Enemies: Bubble: A possessed being that can't stay still. Jumpy: A colourful variation of the Bubble that can stay underwater for hours on end. Bosses: There is a boss at the end of every level. If you learn their tactics, it'll be a breeze. Be aware of the Flawless Gemstones as they vanish after time! Trunk: An tree-mendous beast that can fly. King Bubble: This bubble monster is a giant! Glow: A timid but terrible ball of light. Snowy: He was made long ago and seems to be melting... odd... Suck: a large saxophone that sucks his enemies into his mouth. Evil Chirpy: The brother of our feathered friend. watch out!
